sentences.sContent: Because my left eye is so weak, my right eye has to work harder to compensate.
sentences.sCn: 因为我左眼视力差，右眼就要辛苦点来弥补一下。

sentences.sContent: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.sCn: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

remMethod.val: com(共同)+pens(衡量)+ate→把两个东西放在一起衡量， 来弥补不足→弥补

words.tran: 可补偿的；应予以补偿的

trans.tranOther: to replace or balance the effect of something bad
